content.question: The practice of circumambulating Hindu temples such as the Lakshmana Temple was intended to enable devotees to

choices.label: find others who worshipped Vishnu, the primary deity of the temple
meditate on Hindu principles as they approached the inner sanctuary
visualize the history of the spread of Hinduism throughout the region
locate sculptures of the particular deity whose protection they desired

content.answer: meditate on Hindu principles as they approached the inner sanctuary
